roleset.name: pulverize
roleset.note: MASH-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. (from mash.01-v)

example.name: arg0 as subject
example.text: She swung her eyes up to the blue of the window , her jaws gently mashing the bitter beans .

example.name: participle
example.text: There was [*-1] to be roast chicken with dressing , giblet gravy , asparagus , new peas with a sprig of mint , creamed onions , and mashed potatoes -- all chosen , prepared , and cooked [*]by Viola herself .
